goal.ch: 「系統」是指一個必須由不同的元素整合再一起來達到某個目標的組合體。一個能夠達成目標的系統設計、實現、整合與驗證因為跨領域資源及專長的整合形成一項挑戰。這門課將針對應用於太空任務的系統常用的系統工程方法、工具與應用作介紹。我們同時也會認識衛星及酬載系統常見的嵌入式系統設計與應用作爲系統工程計畫的範例。
goal.en: A system refers to a collection of elements that are integrated together to accomplish a goal that would not have otherwise been possible individually. The design, implementation, integration, and validation of a system capable of accomplishing its mission poses many challenges that have to be considered due to the challenges of combining resources and expertise across multiple domains. In this class, we will cover the methodologies and application of systems engineering toward systems designed to function as part of a space mission. We will also understand the concepts and applications of embedded systems that are commonly encountered in the design of spacecraft and payload systems as an example of a systems engineering project.
